tool.name: Homoscedasticity and normality
tool.description: Checks the homogeneity of the variance and the normality of the distribution

param.name: variable
param.label: Select column containing numerical values (like abundances)

tool.help:
================================= Compute Homogeneity and normality =================================
**What it does**
This tool checks homogeneity of variances (Levene test) on factors for every species represented by multiple boxplots and the normal distribution of a numerical value represented by two plots.
**Input description**
A tabular file with observation data. Must at least contain three columns which associates year, species, abundance and a factor.
+----------+-----------+----------------+ | date | number | species.code | +==========+===========+================+ | year | 4 | speciesID | +----------+-----------+----------------+ | ... | ... | ... | +----------+-----------+----------------+
**Output**
A text output that summarizes the result of the performed Levene test for homogeneity of variances (homoscedasticity). Multiple PNG files representing the homogeneity of variances for each species at each time point of the study. One PNG file representing the distribution of the data as in the following image.
.. image::Norm_distrib.png
